entry.tran: (躁狂和抑郁交替发作的)狂躁抑郁症的，患躁郁症的
entry.def: If someone is manic-depressive, they have a medical condition in which they sometimes feel excited and confident and at other times very depressed.

example.ex: She told them that her daughter-in-law was manic-depressive...
example.tran: 她告诉他们，她的儿媳是狂躁抑郁症患者。

example.ex: Manic depressive illness affects men and women equally.
example.tran: 男人和女人患狂躁抑郁症的概率相等。

means.word_mean: 1. a person afflicted with manic-depressive illness
